reviews.review: Counter-Strike Source – это игра миллионов. Сама по себе игра имеет довольно простой, но захватывающий гемплей. В эту игру можно играть как одному ( с ботами) так и с друзьями. Сейчас серверов css очень и очень много, на каждом из которых свои режимы игры, такие как: гонка вооружений (gun game),(death match),(zombie mod),классический командный бой и многие другие интересные режимы. Карт в этой игре тоже огромное количество. Игра хорошая и я советую поиграть в нее каждому.

Valve has taken a large selection of the maps from Counter-Strike 1.6 - Office, Havana, Italy, Aztec, Chateau, Cobble, Piranesi and of course eternal favourites Dust and Dust 2, and recreated them for the source engine. This means all new textures and major aesthetic changes with more complex buildings and scenery. In addition, the levels are scattered with objects that react realistically with the Source engine's physics engine. A rather good game. Graphics and models are satisfactory and there aren't a lot of hackers in this game (as far as I know, but I could be wrong). This game really boosts teamwork abilities in people unlike other games. Personally, I prefer this to CSGO. Believe me, this is worth buying.

Неочень понравилась. Всю жизнь играл 1.6 и соурс на пиратках, решил купить по акции и разочаровался. Пульки летят как то косо, в упор зажимаешь АК-47 и тебя сливают с пистолета. Понравились новые шрейдеры, да и графончик чуть подпровили ( по сравнению с 34v ) Итог : Зря потратил деньги. Если вы фанат CS то не советую брать лицензионую ( лично сам купил, поиграл немного и снова в пиратку ушёл :) )

Un clásico. Aunque simple, no deja de ser el shooter (a mi parecer) más famoso del mundo, y aun sin estar tal vez a la altura de otros títulos como COD o Battlefield en cuanto a gráficos o variedad, se trata de un juego que para todo amante de este género, es indispensable en su biblioteca de Steam. Juego rápido, mapas para aburrir, y lo mejor de todo: [u]NUNCA MUERE ![/u] (En sagas como las mencionadas anteriormente, cada vez que aparece una nueva generación de videojuegos, disminuye bastante la población online de los que ya habían)

[b]Recomendado 100%.[/b] 200% Si conoces a amigos que lo tengan ;)

Counter Strike — игра, на которой выросло целое поколение. Она отчасти является прародительницей современных он-лайн шутеров вроде Battlefield, Call Of Duty и т.д.  Это игра, с которой начиналась вся моя игровая жизнь, еще с компьютерных клубов. Она настолько привлекательна, что от неё сложно потом оторваться, это как будто затягивает тебя в этот мир, где всегда нужно быть начеку ...
Древняя, но и классная игра! В неё, мне кажется будет играть , даже следующее поколение!
Gammalt spel som alltid funkar på alla datorer. Trots grafiken är dålig så är det sjukt underhållande och flyter på riktigt snabbt och bra.

I will love CSS to my death, first game on Steam and the one I played when I was a kid, it became the center of my childhood, from matches with bots, to the crazy randomization of cs_havana, to  the many mod creativity with zombies and minigames, and SmoothFewFilms Leet World, it was the center of all for me. CSS is now remembered as the "game you need to play Gmod with" because of the many assests it is used for maps. One thing alot of people I think don't know is the fact you can access an area in cs_assault that you were definitely not suppose to which brings your point further about unpolished maps, but basically from CT Spawn go up the stairs to the train and behind you there is some fences on a wall, with some strafe jumps you can access the roof of a building.
This game has so many layers
10% Luck, 20% Skill, 15% Concentrated Power of Will, 5% Pleasure, 50% Pain, and 100% Reason to Remember the Name.

What can I say? This game is totally deserving of its reputation and status.

It was, if not still is, one of the most popular multiplayer FPS games ever created. If you're a fan of Half-Life 2 and thought the gunplay was lacking, then you will find that Counter-Strike and its family doesn't fall short in the same respect. The game forces you to aim properly and not run around as fast as possible, spraying and praying like an idiot unlike some more "modern" FPS games.
Quite possibly because the game (and thus, many of its players) has been around for long, the skill level required to successfully play this game is set very high compared to others. Make what you wish of this, but if you're used to hand-holding console FPS games with autoaim, you're going to get fragged a lot. I don't mean this as an insult to console gamers, just a warning.
The variety of weapon categories is reasonable, though weapons in the same category can sometimes feel rather same-y, especially in the assault rifle category. You've got pistols, submachine guns, shotguns, assault rifles, battle rifles, sniper rifles and a singular machine gun, the M249. Each of them excel at different ranges and for their lack of significant variance, give a surprisingly different feel in context of accuracy and rate of fire.
Although this version of Counter-Strike has been succeeded by Global Offensive, I'd still recommend this game. I haven't played GO so I can't give a properly informed opinion on it, but the overall feel of it looks to me like it isn't really Counter-Strike anymore. Again, just my 2c, you're welcome to disagree for your own reasons.
If nothing else, Counter-Strike Source significantly surpasses the original in graphical fidelity. I can't really think of a reason to buy the original over this unless you want to save money or have a VERY old PC which isn't up to the task. Not that Counter-Strike doesn't have its own historical merit for being what I think should be regarded as revolutionary.
Overall, if you're looking for a competitive multiplayer experience that will give you great potential to become a skillful FPS gamer, I'd definitely recommend CS:S - so long as you're willing to put in that effort - which unfortunately I'm not, but that doesn't mean I don't still enjoy the game. Even if you get bored of the vanilla game, there's gungame, jailbreak (I think..?), xtreme climb, zombie mod and other little modifications all of which alter the gameplay in surprisingly significant ways for how little of the core game they actually change.

This game, wow where do you start, the feel to this game is great. theres a few quirks you learn to live with and just become a anoyance. This is a solid game, well oiled and polished. the guns feel good, the action is fluid, all in all it just plays so dam well. Servers are still all there and a good community going well, map packs you purchase like some of the other games in this genre are not here as the community makes the maps. Or just install it yourself and make your own its all there, or run your own server. This is a rock solid game from the ground up, get it on special when you can, you wont regret this purchase. The admins on most servers keep on top of all the trolls bhop and hackers, aswell as the annoying campers. id recommend this game for all ages and skills as there are enough servers out there to cater for everyone. If you bump into me you always get a TAKE IT from the knife master. But all else this is so fun to play.
